website_summaries.verdict: Whether you bowl for recreation or are looking for an exceptional ball for your favorite league, the Black Widow Legend is built to perform the way you intend it to, with its responsive action.
pros: This ball is known for its top-notch performance in all types of lane conditions
Hooks easily, and delivers good drive all the way through the pins
Suitable for mid-level bowlers looking to up his or her game
or for the competitive bowler who needs a reliable ball
cons: Rare reports of chips occurring after regular use
Amateurs will likely find it has a bit of a learning curve to master control

customer_reviews.title: Had a great experience!
customer_reviews.text: Literally improved my average in my first 3 games. My average was 169. My first 3 games in order are 179, 197, and 220. My 2nd games are always my worst games and I've never gone up before like this. Truly an excellent ball and btw there was no practice with this ball. Went right into league bowling which is very scary. Highly recommend this ball because my experience was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Powell

customer_reviews.title: Love the performance of this ball
customer_reviews.text: Love the performance of this ball. Comes with various drilling patterns for the bowling style and lane type you often bowl on..but which ever way you drill it, it'll be versatile enough for you to adjust to most lane conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Viper123

customer_reviews.title: Knock off, cant be a real Spider
customer_reviews.text: Dont know the material used to make this ball, a lot different from my other bowling balls...scuffed up really easy and left permanent marks after one game.. It does have a lot of back end power as advertised, however, the ball is cheaply made..
customer_reviews.author: Unlike28

customer_reviews.title: Not a sound choice at all!
customer_reviews.text: The ball does not hook well at all as expected. It is being released correctly each and every time on medium to well oiled lanes in both houses that I bowl at. Thus far, after rolling 6 games the bowl has received 3 long scratches to its cover stock. I’m certainly not happy with its core values as stressed by the manufacturer and other reviews which have been inconsistent with true reviews as expressed.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Emerson

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used a ball like this since the Paradygm
customer_reviews.text: I am elated! I've had other balls that claimed to react but didn't produce for me. I haven't used a ball like this since the Paradygm. The grab is tight and the flow is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Ball Is A Game Changer!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hands down the best ball out there. The reaction you get from the ball along with the power it has when it hits the pocket is like no other. Before I got this ball I would describe myself as a spare bowler. I got a few strikes a game but for the most part it was either 8/ or 9/ Well no more. I'm getting at least 6 strikes each game. My average has jumped 30 plus points in the week and a half I've had this ball. You only need two balls in your bag. The widow legend and the widow spare. That's it
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: It is almost perfect for my bowling style which is by no means ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't even know what to say about this ball. It is almost perfect for my bowling style which is by no means text book. I wouldn't trade it for anything. It is the only ball that for me breaks perfectly. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: black widow ball
customer_reviews.text: great ball just got done bowling league works great on oil of course you have to maintain speed or it will hook out of control depends on lanes how to hold ball for release under,side no lift etc. same as any other ball adapt to lane conditions
customer_reviews.author: bob*289

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome ball ..I had it drilled to go long, and it hits like a whip on the backend. NO. B.S.
customer_reviews.author: doran Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I love it and it was perfect for me to learn ...
customer_reviews.text: I went from being a straight bowler with a plastic ball to learning to hook with this ball. I love it and it was perfect for me to learn with. Still use it and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball - very hard back end
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ball. There is a ton of action on the back end. It took me a bit to get used to it, but now that I have, I love it. It's not the strongest hooking ball I have thrown, but it is up there. Also, it is very forgiving (16 lb), because it hits like a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D Testroet

customer_reviews.title: Not hooking consistently
customer_reviews.text: Didn't handle the new oil on lanes. So got rid of ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ball.  Remember,  no finger holes.  They have to be custom made.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Beautiful ball. Btw there are no finger holes! You have to find a bowling alley that can make them custom. Lol but my husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Peka Segio

customer_reviews.title: The "Legend" is truly that... a "LEGEND!"
customer_reviews.text: What I loked was the timely manner for delivery of my "Legend" by Hammer. I've used it in league play and was entirely appreciative of the performance (the drilling layout plays a great part here).
customer_reviews.author: Muhsin S.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy junk.
customer_reviews.text: Ball dosent hook at all. Should have returned it. Looked used
customer_reviews.author: Dean T Kademenos

customer_reviews.title: Quality bowling ball.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ball. Well balanced for my throw. Hammer makes a very good bowling ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K.

customer_reviews.title: It has a dent
customer_reviews.text: We just got the ball drilled. My husband just took it out of the box today to get it drilled and there is a dent in the ball. This ball was band new.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Sparacello

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: With being only like a 160/170 average bowler after a few games using this ball I bowled a 250 and then a 238 to follow great ball!!
customer_reviews.author: Cole Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Holes drilled by a pro
customer_reviews.text: Bowling game improved by 40... was avg 130, I'm at 170 now.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Carranza

customer_reviews.title: Ball was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The ball had a decent size crack in it. And the box that it got sent in was pretty banged up.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but the person loves the ball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good ball, but be aware it has a late snap hook. Took some getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Tancredi

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Drilled for medium hook and it hits the pocket hard.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Labram

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. Huge break at the back end. Awesome ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, my score when up an average of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, my score when up an average of 40 points from a lane ball. Ball is definitely meant for oily lanes like it says, ball is incredibly difficult to control on dry lanes.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball on the lanes
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball on the lanes. I went to a lighter ball and this one really gets the action. I was worried it wouldn't but the increase in speed more than makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Fred M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's working great...wicked hook...picks up the7 very well. Overall I like it...does what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Earnestine Gardner

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the ball back in December. got it drilled a week later.. So far I'm still working with it getting used to it but my average has shot up by at least 17-20 points. I'm trying to adjust and perfect my roll / release so it's taking time to get used to. So far so good. No regrets.. I like the color as I got pink inserts.. I love the hook I'm able to put on it.
customer_reviews.author: DaveSincere

customer_reviews.title: Haven, t had ball drilled will get it drilled ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven,t had ball drilled will get it drilled next week. Had the ball drilled it performance is great.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Govan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bowling ball wicked back end just bowled my highest game ever in league
customer_reviews.author: sam sarver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ball I ever bowled with, I threw my highest game ever, 258.
customer_reviews.author: denneil bruce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ball, still tweaking my release with this new ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Ball , still tweaking my release with this new ball , but so far , its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Love it, awesome ball
customer_reviews.text: Love it, awesome ball! Takes some practice to dial it in, as with any new ball, but once you do it is lethal.
customer_reviews.author: manuel vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ball I had drilled with a skid flip pattern.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball. I am a lefty that hadn't bowled in 40 years. I had it drilled with a skid flip pattern and after a few games, I really increased my scoring. I just won sweeps this week! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: John Aube

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!
customer_reviews.text: This ball is the bomb! A great price here on Amazon compared to my local pro shop!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Leyva

product_meta.title: Hammer Black Widow Legend Bowling Ball
product_meta.description: Hammer is calling to what it is, a legend. The Black Widow Legend takes the proven history of the Black Widow line and takes it up a notch. This is the first ball in this line to use a hybrid coverstock. This ball is aggressive with it's polished cover and then combine it with popular Gas Mask core to provide awesome movement on the backend that carries through the pins. Color: Black/Red Pearl Reaction: Strong to mid-lane with massive backend Coverstock: NBT Hybrid Core Type: Gas Mask (includes Flex-Resin additive, Ceramix surface process, and Carbon-Fiber outer core) Factory Finish: 500, 500, 500, 1000 Abralon with Power House Factory Finish at 300 RPM Speed Radius of Gyration (RG): 2.50 Differential (Diff): .058 RG and Diff are based off of 15 lb. balls Hook Potential: High Length: Medium Recommended Lane Condition: Medium-Heavy Oil 3 year manufacturer's warranty
feature_bullets: Hammer is calling to what it is, a legend
The Black Widow Legend takes the proven history of the Black Widow line and takes it up a notch
This is the first ball in this line to use a hybrid coverstock
